h2. information gathered from bo cpu & storage nodes.

this info is stored in comp:bo_monitor_db
for more detailed model info see model:monitoringModelOsis.py

{code}
Device  
    drpguid #if also known in DRP
    motherboard
        tempsensors[]
            description
            temp
            tempavgLastHour
        fans[]
            description
            speed            
    memory      
        description    
        mbcapacity
        mbused

    cpu
        nrcores
        mhzcapacity  #if 4 cores found & each 2Ghz, mhzcapacity=8000
        mhzused
        mhzUsedAvgLastHour

    disks[]
        description
        deviceid  #string which defines location the device e.g. /dev/sda on linux on windows ??? 
        gbcapacity
        type #e.g. sata
        smartinfo
            temp
            ...
    nics
        type #e.g. ethernet, infiniband
        dev
        fullduplex #True/False
        speed #100mbit, ...
        macaddress
        ...    
    pcicards[]
        type
        description
            
Event
    drpguid
    logs[]
        osisguid
    traceback
    type #windowsevents, pymonkeyevents, syslog, ...
    severity
    description
    source

Log  #non versioned in OSIS, is on file level (detect if new files on appropriate locations), NOT SYSLOG (is event)
    drpguid
    source
    filepath
    agentguid
    level
    content
    creationdate
    type (e.g. job,pymonkeylog, ...)
    
pmachine
    drpguid #if also known in DRP
    timestamp
    hypervisors[]
        type  #virtualbox, xen, solariszones, ...

    swap
        deviceid #where on system 
        gbcapacity
        gbused
    zfs
        storagepools[]
            gbcapacity
            gbused
            status
            name
            vdevs[]
                name
                type
                ...
            filesystems[]
                ....
            zvols[]
                ....
    partitions
        deviceid  #string which defines location of partition e.g. /dev/sda1 on linux on windows ???
        type #e.g. ext3
        gbcapacity
        gbused
    nics
        type #e.g. ethernet
        virtual #True/False e,g. crossbow
        speed #100mbit, ...
        ipaddresses[]
            subnet
            ...
        macaddress
        mbsend   #mbytes send, is absolute number
        bandwithSendOverLastHour #mbit
        #same for receive
        nrpacketssec #usefull to detect DOS attack
        #same for receive
        
    processes[]
        name
        memused
        cpuused
        cpuusedAvgLastHour
        pid
        ...

vmachine
    drpguid #if also known in DRP
    hypervisortype
    performance
        nrcores 
        percUsedInRelationTo1PhsyicalCore  #e.g. vmachine uses 90% of 1 core 
        percUsedInRelationTo1PhsyicalCoreAvgLastHour  #e.g. vmachine uses 90% of 1 core during last hour, in other words serious issue, can be like 300%        
    cpu
        cores
             link to core on device (if relevant)
    memory            
        mbcapacity
    vnics
        linkToPmachineNic
    vdisks
        imagePath #option
        zvolId
        partitionId



{code}
